examples.title: Orbeon Forms - XForms Examples and Apps
examples.example: View the Orbeon Forms XForms and custom controls in action, including using a tabviews, file and image attachments, and a dynamic item editor.
The Espresso Order demo shows powerful aspect of XForms in a compact example: declarative binds, repeats, dynamic sets of items and dynamic rules.
The XForms Bookcast app is part of the Orbeon Forms tutorial. It shows simple XRX-style database access, repeats, and more!
